headline: Scaling a 7-Figure Brand (Ecoxall)
description: Established brand needed to scale. We focused on ROAS optimization and inventory-aware campaign management.

details.challenge: Established brand (Ecoxall) needed to scale profitably while maintaining healthy margins across 200+ product listings.
details.solution: Comprehensive PPC strategy with focus on ROAS optimization, aggressive A+ content development, and inventory-aware campaign management.
details.results: Revenue grew from $2.02M to $2.14M. Maintained 4.05 ROAS. TACoS kept under 13.68%.
